title: Controlled Blink
data:
{{obsolete}} ''For a blink that you can control, see [[scroll of blinking]].'' {{Spell |name=Controlled Blink |level=8 |school1={{Translocations}} |school2= |school3= |sources=
*[[Book of the Warp]]
|castingnoise=3 (at the destination) |spellnoise=0 }} {{Flavour|Translocates the caster a short distance, with precise control. Be wary that controlled translocations will cause the subject to become contaminated with magical energy.}} '''Controlled Blink''' is a level 8 [[Translocations]] spell which warps you to a nearby open space of your choice in your [[line of sight]]. The space must be somewhere visible, not deep water or lava, and cannot be behind a translucent wall. While exploring the [[Realm of Zot]] or while carrying the [[Orb of Zot]], Controlled Blink functions like a plain, uncontrolled [[Blink]]. ==Strategy== Usually too expensive to train for a 3 rune game, but it's an excellent escape spell for [[extended]]. Keep in mind that [[Passage of Golubria]] exists, and with a bit of pre-planning, can be used to a similar effect. The benefit of Controlled Blink is that it works in emergencies. ===Tips & Tricks=== * For stabbers, it can be very useful to know the noise grid of this spell. The "@" character is the position where you land after blinking, and the "§" characters are cells where the noise will be heard. 

.........
....§....
..§§§§§..
..§§§§§..
.§§§@§§§.
..§§§§§..
..§§§§§..

== History == *Controlled Blink was removed in [[0.26]]. Controlled Blink's effect can still be found on the [[scroll of blinking]]. *Prior to [[0.17]], Controlled Blink was a level 7 spell. Additionally, use of this spell on levels that prevented [[teleport control]], such as [[The Tomb]] and final levels of a [[Ziggurat]], resulted in an uncontrolled Blink. *In [[0.6]], you couldn't blink into deep water even as a [[merfolk]] unless you were levitating. *Prior to [[0.6]], Controlled Blink was noisier than [[Blink]] and could wake everything within radius 7.
